articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.arweave.dev | nader.lens 🧢
I've been building smart contracts on @ArweaveTeam with @warp_contracts 🧵
- Code in JS, TS, Rust
- Execute arbitrary amounts of compute without additional fees
- No state bloat
- Can directly process rich content / large files
- Warp offers enhancements (speed, caching, sdks)

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Coinvise
MEME CONTEST 🎉
Create a meme related the token launch of Developer DAO, and win some $CODE 😍 
1. Follow @developer_dao
2. RT the first tweet of the thread below
3. Reply your meme in the first tweet of the thread below & drop your ENS.

Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): In celebration of our highly anticipated $CODE token launch, we're kicking off our first-ever MEME CONTEST, powered by @CoinviseCo 🎉 🎉
How will it work?
Create a meme related the token launch of Developer DAO, and stand a chance of winning $CODE tokens 👀 
Go go go 🔥 🔥

articles.description:
RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.arweave.dev | nader.lens 🧢
the millionaires left in Silicon Valley paying $5,000 per month to live in a place where they became grossly wealthy profiting from surveillance capitalism, digital colonialism, and exclusive access to high paying jobs are not interested in technology that disrupts the status quo
Noah Smith 🐇🇺🇦: Anecdotally, from 2017 through 2021 I knew a lot of people in Silicon Valley who were very excited about crypto, and I know very few now.
